articles.title: Barstool Sports is acquired by Penn Entertainment
articles.description: Barstool Sports has been sold to Penn Entertainment Inc. Penn paid about $388 million for the remaining stake in Barstool Sports that it doesn't already own, the sports and entertainment company said Friday.
articles.content: Barstool Sports has been sold to Penn Entertainment Inc. Penn paid about $388 million for the remaining stake in Barstool Sports that it doesn't already own, the sports and entertainment company said… [+908 chars]

articles.description: With Selection Sunday three weeks away, FOX Sports college basketball reporter John Fanta gives us his favorite futures to cut down the nets.

articles.title: Ireland bat first in must-win game against West Indies in T20 World Cup
articles.description: Follow live text, in-play clips and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra as West Indies face Ireland in the Women’s T20 World Cup.
articles.content:
Ireland captain Laura Delany: "We'll have a bat first. It's a nice wicket, we fielded first the other day and we want to change that up.
